mod = op.models.physics.ad_dif_conductance.ad_dif
self.phys.add_model(propname='throat.ad_dif_conductance_powerlaw', model=
    mod, s_scheme='powerlaw')
self.phys.regenerate_models()
self.ad.setup(conductance='throat.ad_dif_conductance_powerlaw')
self.ad.run()
x = [0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.89653, 0.89653, 0.89653, 1.53924, 1.53924, 1.53924, 
    2.0, 2.0, 2.0]
y = np.around(self.ad['pore.concentration'], decimals=5)
assert_allclose(actual=y, desired=x)
